General.Name: Bestechnic (Shanghai) Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Bestechnic (Shanghai) Co., Ltd engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of smart audio and video SoC chips. Its products have applications in earbuds, neckband earphones, headphones, Bluetooth speakers, and audio adapters. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Shanghai, China.
